column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have been eating ramen since I was little girl
column2: and even before it was even trendy. This is a great little place to enjoy ramen
column3: and they're very flexible when it comes to options and what you want in your ramen. I am particular on what I put in my ramen
column4: and they were able to accommodate. Prices
column8: so you're get what you pay for. :) Parking is little crazy though. There is a parking garage next door and don't park where  you're not allowed to park (watch out for the signs) because there is towing company the establishments around the area call and they're around the corner.  You will be towed and all it takes is 15 minutes.
